attributes.action: Any referendum on Brexit should only have the choice of no deal or deal
attributes.additional_details: No third option of remain should be allowed. Is does not take a genius to work out that remainers will say remain whilst leavers May split over the decision
attributes.background: There has already been a referendum to leave or remain. That referendum found that the majority want to leave. Now the final referendum should be to leave with or without a deal ONLY.
